languages.text: {n}Синтетические гиперадреналиновые железы и баки со стероидами роста регулярно вбрасывают в кровь гиганта порцию отравы, заставляя ее кипеть, а разум — пребывать в агонии ярости.{/n}
{n}Synthetic hyperadrenaline glands and growth steroid tanks regularly pump batches of poison into the giant's bloodstream, causing it to boil and its mind to perpetuate a furious agony.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Синтетические гиперадреналиновые железы и баки со стероидами роста регулярно вбрасывают в кровь гиганта порцию отравы, заставляя ее кипеть, а разум — пребывать в агонии ярости.{/n}

languages.text: {n}合成ハイパーアドレナリン腺と成長ステロイドタンクは定期的に大量の毒を巨人の血流に送り込み、血を沸騰させ、その精神には猛烈な苦痛が永続的に続く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Synthetic hyperadrenaline glands and growth steroid tanks regularly pump batches of poison into the giant's bloodstream, causing it to boil and its mind to perpetuate a furious agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}合成ハイパーアドレナリン腺と成長ステロイドタンクは定期的に大量の毒を巨人の血流に送り込み、血を沸騰させ、その精神には猛烈な苦痛が永続的に続く。{/n}

languages.text: {n}怪物身上的合成超体肾上腺素腺体与生长类固醇罐，会定期朝怪物血液内注入大量毒素，让怪物浑身的鲜血沸腾，对意识造成持续的剧烈痛苦。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Synthetic hyperadrenaline glands and growth steroid tanks regularly pump batches of poison into the giant's bloodstream, causing it to boil and its mind to perpetuate a furious agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}怪物身上的合成超体肾上腺素腺体与生长类固醇罐，会定期朝怪物血液内注入大量毒素，让怪物浑身的鲜血沸腾，对意识造成持续的剧烈痛苦。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las glándulas sintéticas de hiperadrenalina y los depósitos de esteroides de crecimiento bombean con regularidad dosis de veneno en el torrente sanguíneo del gigante, haciendo que hierva y perpetuando la agonía furiosa de su mente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Synthetic hyperadrenaline glands and growth steroid tanks regularly pump batches of poison into the giant's bloodstream, causing it to boil and its mind to perpetuate a furious agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las glándulas sintéticas de hiperadrenalina y los depósitos de esteroides de crecimiento bombean con regularidad dosis de veneno en el torrente sanguíneo del gigante, haciendo que hierva y perpetuando la agonía furiosa de su mente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Synthetische Hyperadrenalin-Drüsen und Tanks mit Wachstumssteroiden pumpen regelmäßig Gift in den Blutkreislauf des Riesen, wodurch dieser zu kochen beginnt und sein Verstand wütende Qualen erleidet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Synthetic hyperadrenaline glands and growth steroid tanks regularly pump batches of poison into the giant's bloodstream, causing it to boil and its mind to perpetuate a furious agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Synthetische Hyperadrenalin-Drüsen und Tanks mit Wachstumssteroiden pumpen regelmäßig Gift in den Blutkreislauf des Riesen, wodurch dieser zu kochen beginnt und sein Verstand wütende Qualen erleidet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des glandes d'hyperadrénaline synthétique et des réservoirs de stéroïdes de croissance injectent régulièrement des doses de poison dans le système sanguin du géant, maintenant son esprit dans un état constant de fureur et d'agonie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Synthetic hyperadrenaline glands and growth steroid tanks regularly pump batches of poison into the giant's bloodstream, causing it to boil and its mind to perpetuate a furious agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des glandes d'hyperadrénaline synthétique et des réservoirs de stéroïdes de croissance injectent régulièrement des doses de poison dans le système sanguin du géant, maintenant son esprit dans un état constant de fureur et d'agonie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sentetik hiperadrenalin bezleri ve tümörlerdeki steroit tankları; dev canavarın kan dolaşımına düzenli olarak büyük miktarlarda zehir pompalıyor, kanının kaynamasına ve zihnindeki öfkeyle dolu ızdırabın sürmesine neden oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Synthetic hyperadrenaline glands and growth steroid tanks regularly pump batches of poison into the giant's bloodstream, causing it to boil and its mind to perpetuate a furious agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sentetik hiperadrenalin bezleri ve tümörlerdeki steroid tankları, dev canavarın kan dolaşımına düzenli olarak büyük miktarlarda zehir pompalayarak kanının kaynamasına ve zihnindeki öfkeyle dolu ızdırabın sürmesine neden oluyor.{/n}
